targets.query: uuid: $uuid AND metricName.keyword: API99thLatency AND labels.verb.keyword: $verb AND labels.resource.keyword: $resource
uuid: $uuid AND metricName.keyword: APIRequestRate AND labels.verb.keyword: $verb AND labels.resource.keyword: $resource

panels.title: Aggregated Kubelet/CRI-O CPU usage in worker nodes
Aggregated Kubelet/CRI-O memory usage in worker nodes

targets.query: uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName: "containerCPU-Masters" AND labels.namespace.keyword: openshift-kube-apiserver
uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName: "containerMemory-Masters" AND labels.namespace.keyword: openshift-kube-apiserver
uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName: "containerCPU-Masters" AND labels.namespace.keyword: openshift-kube-controller-manager
uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName: "containerMemory-Masters" AND labels.namespace.keyword: openshift-kube-controller-manager
uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName: "containerCPU-Masters" AND labels.namespace.keyword: openshift-etcd
uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName: "containerMemory-Masters" AND labels.namespace.keyword: openshift-etcd
uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName: "containerCPU-Masters" AND labels.node.keyword: $master AND labels.namespace.keyword: $namespace
uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName: "containerMemory-Masters" AND labels.node.keyword: $master AND labels.namespace.keyword: $namespace

Avg. container memory usage in infra nodes

list.definition: { "find" : "terms", "field": "labels.node.keyword", "query": "metricName.keyword: nodeRoles AND labels.role.keyword: master AND uuid.keyword: $uuid"}

list.name: master
